titleStmt.title: The sea-mans leave taken of his sweetest Margery. And Margery her singing loath to depart, being very unwilling to leave her sweet-heart. To the tune of. I'le goe through the world with thee.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second part. To the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
